page.title: 13A DAY IN MY LIFE-AFTERNOON
page.content: On the field after lunch, my friends and I usually play football. English, French and Music follow the lunch break. At last the bell sounds for the end of school. There is a dash for the doors as school children flood out. As soon as I reach home I dash upstairs and change into my shorts. I help my mother to tidy up toys which have been scattered about the floor. I then go out to play cricket with my friends. Tea is at 5pm and consists of sandwiches, crisps and a biscuit. After tea I play cricket again. When I arrive back my mother has gone to work in the local restaurant and I put the babies to bed. I will usually watch some television before going up to bed and reading. An account of a typical school day.
